SUMMARY
Career changer with a background in mechanical engineering, recently completed intensive coding bootcamp. Passionate about solving complex problems with code. Strong analytical skills from engineering background combined with newly acquired full-stack development capabilities.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
Languages: JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS
Frontend: React, Redux, Bootstrap
Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB
Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Postman
Learning: TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Docker

BOOTCAMP PROJECTS

Job Board Application (Capstone Project)
- Full-stack MERN application for job seekers and employers
- Implemented user authentication with JWT tokens
- Built RESTful API with Express and MongoDB
- Deployed to Heroku with MongoDB Atlas

Weather Dashboard
- React application consuming OpenWeather API
- Implemented geolocation and city search features
- Used Redux for state management
- Styled with CSS modules and animations

Task Management CLI Tool
- Python command-line application for task tracking
- Used SQLite for local data persistence
- Implemented CRUD operations and filtering
- Published to PyPI as open source
